title: Converts projects to use the `@nx/angular:application` executor or the `@angular-devkit/build-angular:application` builder.
description: Converts a project or all projects using one of the `@angular-devkit/build-angular:browser`, `@angular-devkit/build-angular:browser-esbuild`, `@nx/angular:browser` and `@nx/angular:browser-esbuild` executors to use the `@nx/angular:application` executor or the `@angular-devkit/build-angular:application` builder.

project.description: Name of the Angular application project to convert. It has to contain a target using one of the `@angular-devkit/build-angular:browser`, `@angular-devkit/build-angular:browser-esbuild`, `@nx/angular:browser` and `@nx/angular:browser-esbuild` executors. If not specified, all projects with such targets will be converted.

useNxExecutor.description: Convert targets to use the `@nx/angular:application` executor instead of the `@angular-devkit/build-angular:application` builder.
